entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is a owl who is a companion of Harry Potter. She is described as hopping inside the window and hooting dolefully when the window was open wide enough.

entities.name: professor binns
entities.description: Professor Binns is a teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned in the text as being watched by Harry with an anxious glance.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as trying to remove a letter from Hedwig's leg and realizing that she was hurt.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is mentioned in the text as leaning in closer to examine Hedwig's wing.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned in the text as leaning in closer to examine Hedwig's wing.

relationships.description: Harry Potter has a companion owl named Hedwig. This relationship is described as Harry trying to remove a letter from Hedwig's leg.
Professor Binns is watched by Harry Potter with an anxious glance. This relationship is described as Harry trying to remove a letter from Hedwig's leg and looking at Professor Binns.
Harry Potter is with Hermione when they are examining Hedwig's wing. This relationship is described as Hermione leaning in closer to examine Hedwig's wing.
Harry Potter is with Ron when they are examining Hedwig's wing. This relationship is described as Ron leaning in closer to examine Hedwig's wing.
